mapper.insert: insert into artwork ( name, artist, info) values (#{name},#{artist},#{info})
mapper.select: select b.avatar,a.*,(select u.name from user u where u.id=a.artist) as artist_name,(select url from artwork_media m where m.artwork_id=a.id limit 1) as url from artwork a left join artist b on a.artist=b.user_id where a.id=#{0} and a.review=1
